result.execSummary:
The defendant Angela M. Hudson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Angela M. Hudson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Angela M. Hudson was found guilty of Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Angela M. Hudson

records.addlTxt: e: DA and Atty Satorius.      c: DE and SCSO  arc

3:10 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Erica Ellenwood in court for State of Wisconsin, Attorney Travis Satorius in court for Angela M. Hudson, Defendant Angela M. Hudson in court. Atty Satorius recites agreement. DE sworn. DE pleads NO CONTEST to Ct 2 - Possess Drug Paraphernalia. Court reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Court finds DE knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily waives rights and makes plea. Court accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 2 - Possess Drug Paraphernalia. On motion of the State without objection, Court dismisses Ct 1. Sentencing recommendations. Atty. Satorius requests bond on file be returned to payor. Defendant advised of appeal rights. 

Court orders: 
Ct 2 - Possess Drug Paraphernalia
- Court Costs $243; payable through Clerk of Court
- DNA Sample and Surcharge $200; payable through Clerk of Court

Court orders bond on file to be returned to payor. 
Payment plan approved. 
Adjourned: 3:19 PM. kma
